name: Kamigami: Clash of the Gods Demo
name_original: Kamigami: Clash of the Gods Demo
description:
You can now join us on the demo! It contains a small part of the world Kamigami can offer you! 

Demo is limited to B rank cards and online mode is available for a limited time!
Do notice we are still working on the online server, so it may not be stable yet, but enjoy all our offline content and also a little bit of the online you can!
